title: Not receiving new Alpha icon?
body:
[This one, of course.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215686407/Alpha-Icon.jpg)
I've seen others with it on, but I haven't recieved one myself. Do I have to send in a ticket to make sure?
I was told to wait until the 29th of Nov., 
but seeing others with it makes me to believe that I should have got one.  {{champion:32}}

replies.body: We're still aiming to have these icons distributed by the end of today, and you'll see some players have them before others.  Hang on until tomorrow, and hit us up if you still haven't received it.  We'll be happy to take a look!
